message: Accept my generous offer and we can split the remaining 2 rounds of the game!
I think a more equitable split is in order. Let's go for a 60/40 split, and we can both get a decent amount. What do you say?
You're getting desperate, Bob. Take it or leave it!
Let's call it even. This round, I propose we split 60/40, but with you getting the larger share this time. We both get more than we did in the last round, and it's a win-win situation.
You're running out of time, Bob. This is my final offer!
